abstract: Under the agreement, Disney will distribute approximately six films a year for Steven Spielberg’s boutique studio.
snippet: Under the agreement, Disney will distribute approximately six films a year for Steven Spielberg’s boutique studio.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  Touchstone Pictures, a film label that the Walt Disney Company had all but abandoned, is coming back to life as the new distribution pipeline for Steven Spielberg’s production company.

headline.main: DreamWorks and Disney Agree to a Distribution Deal
headline.print_headline: DreamWorks and Disney Agree to a Distribution Deal

byline.original: By Brooks Barnes and Michael Cieply
